author: Mark Nicholas
title: This is a time for healing and we are all in charge
description: Sport finds itself on hold now. That provides us a timely opportunity to recalibrate and reassess | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: A parody letter written by the American author Nick Farriella, which appeared on the humour site McSweeneys, has been doing the rounds on social media and WhatsApp groups. It is supposedly from F Scott Fitzgerald, who was quarantined in 1920 in the south of F… [+8321 chars]
